gui.xaero_box_controls:
Controls 
 
 Click and drag to scroll the map. 
 Scroll the mouse wheel to zoom in and out. 
 Right-click the map for some useful shortcuts. 
 Some UI buttons have additional key bindings displayed in their tooltip. 
 %1$sClick here to edit the key bindings.
gui.xaero_box_controls_minimap:
Waypoint controls: 
 §2%s§r to create a new waypoint. 
 §2%s§r to create a quick temporary waypoint. 
 §2%s§r to switch the waypoint set. 
 §2%s§r to toggle rendering all waypoint sets. 
 §2%s§r to open the full waypoint menu. 
 Right-click an existing waypoint for more waypoint controls.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_selected_by_mini: Displaying waypoints from the same waypoint sub-world that you are viewing in game and on the minimap. The sub-world can be switched in the full waypoint menu.
gui.xaero_no_world_map_message: §8§oA dark and dense haze consumes you.. The World-Map and Mini-Map cannot be used in The Great Below...
